thread.title: Milford Sound named one of the top pinned places in the world
thread.title_full: Milford Sound named one of the top pinned places in the world

title: Milford Sound named one of the top pinned places in the world
text:
Milford Sound named one of the top pinned places in the world Last updated 11:18, October 16 2015 Shutterstock 123rf.com Alamy istock 123rf.com 123RF AFP 123rf.com 
The majestic Milford Sound, once hailed as the "Eight Wonder of the World" by Rudyard Kipling is high on the priority list for many overseas travellers. 
The colours, customs and traditions of Kyoto, make this Japanese city a must-do for any traveller. 
Hanoi in Vietnam offers plenty of enchanting wonders to explore. 
Positano is an small Italian town with pristine beaches perfect for eating, drinking and being merry. 
Bourbon Street in New Orleans offers the perfect taste of this Southern American city. 
The exotic Marrakesh, Morocco is on many people's top-pin list, and with so much to explore in the country it is easy to see why. 
From trekking to relaxing, Cape Town offers unforgettable adventures. 
Los Angeles is a bucket-list destination for many. 
Beautiful colorful and vibrant summer cityscape of Lisbon, Portugal 
The Blue Lagoon in Iceland - stunning landscapes and spectacular scenery that is hard to find anywhere else in the world. 
New York. New York. Is there anywhere else like it in the world? 1 of 11 « Previous « Previous Next » Next » 
The South Island's Milford Sound has been named as one of Pinterest's top pinned places in the world. 
The majestic fiord - once hailed the "Eighth Wonder of the World" by Rudyard Kipling - sits alongside the likes of Kyoto (Japan) Reykjavik (Iceland) and New York City as the places most pinned by users of the social media platform. 
The twenty top pinned places (in no particular order) are. 123RF 
Beautiful colorful and vibrant summer cityscape of Lisbon, Portugal 
New York City, United States Reykjavik, Iceland Milford Sound in Fiordland National Park, New Zealand Los Angeles, California, US
